Ayo Adesanya (amuru 11 August 1969) bu onye omere ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye isi na onye na-emeputa ihe
Ayo Adesanya na-apụta na ihe nkiri Yoruba na nke Bekee.
Ayo Adesanya si Ijagun, Ijebu na Ogun State southwest Nigeria
Ayo Adesanya gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Anne dị n'Ibadan, isi obodo Oyo steeti, bụ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị wee nweta  asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị West Africa
O mechara gawa mahadum nke Ibadan ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mass Communication

Ayo Adesanya malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1986 ka ọ mèchàra National Youth Service Scheme (NYSC) N'afọ 1996, Ayo Adesanya sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria (Nollywood) nke ọma wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri wee pụta na mbụ ya na telivishọn bụ ncha Tunji Bamishigbin
Ayo Adesanya mechara sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na-asụ asụsụ Yoruba
Ayo Adesanya na-apụtakwa na ihe nkiri asụsụ bekee
Ayo Adesanya bụbu nwunye Goriola Hassan, mana ugbu a ọ kewapụrụ
